</p><p>
1. A certificate from the Transfer Dep . of the Bank of the U.S. as to transfers from &amp; to Mr. J. B. Harvie, &amp; 
</p><p>
2. Copies of the powers of Attorney by with which these transfers were effected. 
</p><p>
